text: Life is full of beauty. Notice it. Notice the bumble bee, the small child, and the smiling faces. Smell the rain, and feel the wind. Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.
author: Ashley Smith

text: A thing of beauty is a joy forever: its loveliness increases it will never pass into nothingness.
author: John Keats

text: Beauty is eternity gazing at itself in a mirror.
author: Khalil Gibran

text: A beauty is a woman you notice a charmer is one who notices you.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

text: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
